fullText: Stereophonic is a marvel of theatrical craft, a three-hour epic that follows a Fleetwood Mac-esque band through the tortuous process of recording an album in the 1970s.
dtliExcerpt: Stereophonic is a marvel of theatrical craft, a three-hour epic that follows a Fleetwood Mac-esque band through the tortuous process of recording an album in the 1970s.
